review: I tried yohimbine for ED and all I got was a rash, could not sleep. I was always wanting water no matter how much I drank. My lips swoll up and was covered up with a itch that drove me crazy. I had a severe break out. I did fine the first week and had a great sex drive and all but It was not worth it. I am still taking allergy med's to clear up the break out a week later.
Yohimbe (yohimbine):Yohimbe increased bouts of anxiety, general feeling of nausea, will never take again, dry mouth all day even though drinking water.
I have sleep apnea and am trying it as a replacement for my CPAP and so far it work very good.

Yohimbe (yohimbine):I was foaming out of my mouth, nearly vomiting, anxiety and physical discomfort was at its worst,  I could not urinate even though I had to, I severe hunger and I was in this condition for several hours. Needless to say, I did not or could not have sex. Be aware of yohimbe. It was terrifying.
Not good. Nausea and vomiting. A bit of a buzz. No enhancement.
Yohimbe (yohimbine):Aside from the sexual benefit I find what I appreciate most from yohimbe is my improvement in energy. Big improvement.
Yohimbe (yohimbine):It causes a rapid heartbeat and can cause blood pressure to increase, which is dangerous for people that have hypertension.
